task.instruction: Your user id is mei_hernandez_8984. You want to fly from the LaGuardia Airport in New York city to Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport on May 28 (one way). You have to reach airport in between 7:30 to 8:15 PM to reach airport before the actual time. You want to fly in basic economy. You prefer direct flights without any stopover. You have total 2 baggages. You do not want any kind of insurance. You want to use your gift card to pay. Your birthday is in your user profile so you do not prefer to provide it.
